title: Hotfix on Dark Harvest?
body: Like... the rune is busted beyond belief now and NOTHING has been done. Like???? Rito? Are you paying attention to your game? This is game is so trash right now it's ridiculous.  No wonder everyone and their mom is quitting. They only care about selling skins.

I am not a "white knight defending the absurdity that is the game." I'm presenting to you facts that have been happening for over a week now. You cannot deflect your ignorance by name calling and indignation when you are flat out wrong.

Still waiting on them to patch dark harvest over a week after their hotfix did literally nothing. We would all rather it be useless than be like this. Yes, you're defending riot when this shit broke their game and they're taking over a week to fix it. 5-10 champs per game take this rune simply to abuse lane. You are absolutely defending the absurdity of the game, for no good reason.

But thats its only mechanic?

Dark harvest:

Deal damage to low ppl and get some extra stuff and ur next proc deals more damage.

what else can they do?
